Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device that allows people to communicate over long distances.
The student can show that the device uses sound to send and receive information.
The student can use materials in their drawing that represent real-world items used in constructing a string telephone.
The student can depict two students connected by the device, demonstrating the function of sending and receiving sound.
The student can label how the device works using scientific terms related to sound communication.
The student can illustrate the importance of communication technology in helping people connect over distances.
